# iv

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/DavisVaughan/iv/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/DavisVaughan/iv?branch=main)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/DavisVaughan/iv/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/DavisVaughan/iv/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of iv is to provide tools for working with intervals in a generic way.

## Installation

You can install the development version of iv from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DavisVaughan/iv")
```
